text: (napiye! Payirkal karuki) pumi vetta veliyaka iruppatai nirkanpatum meyyakave avanutaiya attatcikalil onrakum. Atan mitu nam malaiyai irakkinal, atu (ceti kotikalal) pacumaiyaki valarkiratu. (Ivvaru irantu pona) pumiyai evan uyirppikkirano avantan maranittavarkalaiyum meyyakave uyirppippan. Niccayamaka avan (anaittin mitum) perarralutaiyavan
